segments.text: I don't know what to do about the people who live in the flat above me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're incredibly selfish . They ' re always up until the wee hours of the night playing their music so loudly that I have to wear earplugs in order to fall asleep !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever talked to them about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I tried to introduce myself to them when they moved in , but they were so arrogant that I didin't want to ever talk to them again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They both just talk about how great they are all the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They soud like the neighbours from hell !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are ! Besides being loud and arrogant , they're also terrible gossips . They're always talking about everybody else in the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you didn't talk to them much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't , but they talk so loudly that I can hear what they're talking about from my bedroom - and it's not very nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do the other people in your apartment think about them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most of my other neighbours are scared of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you should think about moving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't afford to move right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , perhaps you should have a party and try to get to know them better . Maybe once you get to know them , they'll turn out to be more sensitive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you're being a bit optimistic . If you met them , you'd understand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't know what else you could do then . Do you think bribing them with chocolate would work ?
segments.speaker: S2
